talents.name: AbsorptionOfEvil
talents.label: Absorption of Evil
talents.description: Marks are distributed among the highest-ranked Hunters upon merging or absorbing marked Hunters. Damage increases with each mark.

talents.name: TwilightHunting
talents.label: Twilight Hunting
talents.description: Some Hunters transform into Twilight Hunters with increased attack speed. Regular Demon Hunters lose merge rank periodically, marking Twilight Hunters.

talents.name: CloakOfShadows
talents.label: Cloak of Shadows
talents.description: Demon Hunter has a 20% chance to cleanse herself of negative effects when they are received.

talents.name: DarkPact
talents.label: Dark Pact
talents.description: Once per wave, upon destroying a boss, affects the merge rank of a non-Hunter unit and applies multiple marks.

talents.name: StealthAttack
talents.label: Stealth Attack
talents.description: Demon Hunter has a 7% chance to make an extra attack, inflicting an additional 100% damage to the first target for each merge rank.

talents.name: ShadowTwin
talents.label: Shadow Twin
talents.description: When the first boss appears, certain Hunters release a Shadow that mirrors its attack. Shadows also have a chance to spawn upon mini boss appearances. Shadows last for 12 seconds and do 20% of the Hunter's damage.

talents.name: NightParasite
talents.label: Night Parasite
talents.description: Increases the chance of critical damage to bosses and mini bosses by 5% for all Hunters.
